product.title: Gulliver Mickey | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Gulliver Mickey

The tale of Gulliver’s Travels has captivated readers of all ages since 1726. In this delightful Disney reprise, Mickey Mouse plays the role of Gulliver and finds himself shipwrecked in Liliput, a land of little people. After the Liliputians get past their initial fear of Mickey, they become fast friends and learn to embrace one another’s differences.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to describe what she thinks it would be like to be a Liliputian, and to list the challenges she would encounter in your own home.
